<div>I did ask my teenagers (yes, lucky me, I have them, too) how it effects them. One of them is involved in the paranormal investigations and all the research, so she said she thinks it is interesting and she loves it. The 15 yr old said she is afraid of it and hates having to hear about it and listem to it - which I could say about her music choices, but I don't :)</div>
<div>As far as my younger children, 10 yr old and then 1 yr old, they just seem to accept it as part of their Mom's life. I don't hold sessions with the 1 yr old around.</div>

<div>She has had many experiences with ghosts - some very intense - so I would  never let her attend anything until she was mature enough to handle it.</div>
